thread.title: Anne & Mel
thread.title_full: Lifestyle Furniture reviewed by Anne & Mel

author: Anne & Mel
title: Anne & Mel
text:
February 2017 - purchased a 9-drawer chest (pine).
Excellent quality, delivered on time, courteous delivery men and as said above rates as the possibly the finest piece of furniture we have ever bought online.
Would definitely use this company again and based on our experience will recommend them to anyone.
